MedlineCitation.CoiStatement: Dr. Burgess serves on the scientific advisory board for Natrol, LLC, and Moving Mindz, Pty Ltd, and is a consultant for F. Hoffmann-La Roche Ltd. Dr. Goldstein is the part inventor of a circadian rhythm mobile application licensed to Arcascope, LLC, on the medical advisory boards of Huxley Medical, Inc. and eviCore, and receives royalties from UpToDate. All other authors report no relevant financial or non-financial disclosures.
